metadata.title: CVE-2023-32611 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
A flaw was found in GLib. GVariant deserialization is vulnerable to aslowdown issue where a crafted GVariant can cause excessive processing,leading to denial of service.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-32611` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libglib2.0-0 - 2.64.6-1~ubuntu20.04.6
libglib2.0-bin - 2.64.6-1~ubuntu20.04.6
libglib2.0-data - 2.64.6-1~ubuntu20.04.6
libglib2.0-tests - 2.64.6-1~ubuntu20.04.6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: glib2.0 package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.64.6-1~ubuntu20.04.6').
